glosses: to overcome, to handle, to manage

examples.text: Birinin yardım etmesi gerek. Tek başına beceremezsin.

examples.translation: I managed to close the window.
I was able to speak English.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish بجرمك (becermek). Cognate with Azerbaijani bacarmaq, Uyghur [script needed] (becirmäk), Turkmen bejermek, etc.
